title: Middle East Crisis: Palestinians Describe Dire Conditions in Gaza’s Shrinking ‘Humanitarian Zone’
content: An area of southern Gaza where Israel has directed hundreds of thousands of civilians to go has become a “hell” where food and water are scarce, people there say.

title: Man Arrested After Woman and Girl Stabbed in London’s Leicester Square

title: An Australian Start-Up Hopes to Slow Climate Change With an Unusual Approach
